name: KIDDERPORE CHILDS WORLD ENGLISH MEDIUM SCHOOL
briefDescription: KIDDERPORE CHILDâ€™S WORLD ENGLISH MEDIUM SCHOOL, a non - governmental organization, started in 2006 with an objective of providing the basic education, vocational training, non-formal education, nutrition and counseling support to the underprivileged children of Kidderpore. It aimed to bring about a positive change not only in their lives but society as a whole. The journey began by providing non-formal education to handful of local children of Kidderpore and its adjoining areas. Gradually, the school started functioning full time as a regular school by providing basic elementary education to the children from class Nursery onwards. Now the school is having approx. 700 students and is functioning up to class X. Besides education, the school also does various social welfare activities.i)	Basic elementary educationii)	Health Check-ups of the poor and elderly peopleiii)	Sit and draw competition for childreniv)	Fancy Dress competition for childrenv)	Dance and Quiz Competition for childrenvi)	Free books distribution to needy students.vii)	Blanket distribution during winter season.
